entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 2 cm in areas east of Red Deer. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
